name: legendsunny
0:
”Alexa, open legend sunny”
”Alexa, start legend sunny”
”Alexa, launch legend sunny”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: legend sunny
des:
The Legend Sunny needs to be played with an echo show or echo spot. It is an Alexa-powered interactive adventure game with stories adapted from an old legend of the Formosa island. In this skill, you can tell your travel partner, Sunny Mei, what choices to make as you explore the Formosa island with various places, including the Fantasy Lake, Snake Temple, and Crescent Bay. 

You will explore the Formosa island by choosing the adventure paths in the following order:

1. Accept Sunny Mei’s invitation to help her find her family in the Formosa island.
2. Select a native animal to ride on the Formosa island.
3. Travel up the Mountains and arrive in the aboriginal tribe.
4. Talk to the aboriginal girl Ah-Wei in the mountain area to find clues about Sunny Mei’s family.
5. Travel to the Fantasy Lake to find Sunny Mei’s family.
6. Explore the Snake Temple to find Sunny Mei’s family.
7. Search for Sunny Mei’s parents in the Crescent Bay.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
